title: Can we download Islamic Programmes that are available on the internet for free? - Assim al hakeem
transcript: about downloading islamic programs that he does not have the money to buy and it it contains a lot of islamic books that he needs in such cases i see that there's no harm in downloading it as long as it's there and available i'm not hacking into someone's software or hardware it's available on the net anyone can download it and it's for personal use not for mass production or for uh commercial use so if it's for islamic use and for my personal use i see no problem in downloading inshallah our shot from
